entry.title: NDS - 400 - Spee-D Channel Drain (4' Section)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NDS
Type: Channel Drains & Grates
Price: 38.77

DESCRIPTION

The NDS Spee-D Channel systems are lightweight and easy to install and provide a quick and simple alternative to traditional concrete channels. For residential and non-residential applications, the Spee-D Channel has a greater surface area for drainage than the micro and mini channels. Effective in everything from patios to light vehicular traffic areas, the most popular applications for this channel include swimming pools, spas, and patios.

The NDS Spee-D channel drains is 4ft in length and easily adapt to any job. Each channel has available accessories that easily connect to a variety of pipe types and sizes, such as end outlets, bottom outlets, 90s and tees. This flexibility allows you to easily create a customized drainage system for your home. The channel snaps together easily for a smoother installation with flanges on the bottom of the channel provide a lip for anchoring, which ensures a straight installation and prevents floating. The NDS Spee-d Channel grates are available in six colors, making it easy to match to the surrounding surfaces.

  • Durable PVC parts are lightweight and easy to install
  • Component parts snap together easily for a speedy installation
  • System components are chemically resistant and rust proof
  • UV inhibitors in the grates
Material - PVC
Color - Gray
Length - 48''
Height - 3-3/4"
Weight - 3.8000 lb

entry.title: NDS - DS-094N - 5.34" Deep Neutral Dura Slope Channel Drain
entry.summary:
Vendor: NDS
Type: Channel Drains & Grates
Price: 153.75

Includes 1 channel drain. Gray.
Dimension(s): 4 L x 6" W x 5" - 5.34" H.
  • Interlocking tongue and groove joints for secure alignment and easy installation
  • Duraloc integral joint lock to prevent joint movement
  • No extra screws or clamps needed at installation

The NDS Dura Slope trench drain system consists of neutral and pre-sloped sections of trench drain. Manufactured from HDPE, this trench drain offers a durable alternative to concrete channel that will save time and reduce cost at installation.

Part of NDS Dura Slope Series.

The NDS Dura Slope trench drain system consists of neutral and pre-sloped sections of trench drain. Manufactured from HDPE, this trench drain offers a durable alternative to concrete channel that will save time and reduce cost at installation. The Dura Slope trench drain system consists of lightweight, modular sections for easier handling and installation and reduced freight to the site. A built-in slope of 0.7% allows optimal flow rates to be maintained system wide; neutral sections are also available.

The NDS Dura Slope features a ProFit locking system that locks the grate to the integral frame and supports the trench drain during installation. It also features DuraLoc, an integral joint lock which prevents joint movement during installation, no extra clamps or screws needed. It includes interlocking tongue and groove joints and bottom outlet on each channel section and should be used in non-residential applications.

entry.title: NDS - 864 - 5'' Pro Series Channel Drain Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: NDS
Type: Channel Drains & Grates
Price: 93.66

  • Unique interlocking design
  • Allows each channel to securely lock to the next for a secure, tight fit
  • A bottom outlet is built into each channel section and fits 3" And 4" S&d fittings
  • Includes 1 meter (39-3/4") of channel drain and grate
  • Includes 1 end outlet and 1 end cap
  • Extended ribs to make channel more sturdy
  • Lay-Flat design increases stability
  • New rebar tie clips for easier installation
  • New clip-in feature (channel to channel) 

The new and improved NDS 5� Pro Series Deep Profile Channel Drain Kit is the most durable, feature-rich and easy to install modular drainage system in its class. channel is made from injection-molded polypropylene with extended side ribs for increased channel strength and UV inhibitors to prevent fading and cracking. Included slotted grates are light-gray HDPE for up to Class B loading and are ADA-compliant. Channels snap end-to-end quickly and easily with robust male-to-female locking clips for long channel runs. Cut guides allow the channel to be shortened by 4-inch increments for smaller interlocking sections. Included end cap and end outlet combined with new integrated second bottom outlet and side-outlet knockouts provide 8 outlet options per channel section for increased design and installation flexibility. The new side outlets now allow 90-degree, tee and cross configurations to be made in the field without specialty accessories. New strengthened #4 rebar clips along the channel sides allow for quicker and easier installation and increased system strength. Popular applications including driveways, courtyards, plazas, pool decks, parking lots, sports facilities and more. Compatible with the patented NDS Pro Series Qwik-Turn Radius Coupling to allow for curving layouts with up to 6 degrees of deflection between couplings and channels “ NDS is the only drainage manufacturer to offer this incredible ability! Kit comes complete with channel, grates, screws, end caps/outlet and installation instructions. Clear waterproof silicone or welder adhesive can be used in this application.

Downloads

  • Spec Sheet

entry.summary:

Type: Catch Basins

  • Collects excess surface water from lawn, landscape, residential driveways and garages
  • Suitable for light vehicular traffic when properly installed

  • Ablility to withstand normal abuse in landscaping applications
  • sump area collects debris and helps prevent clogged pipes

  • Fade & rust resistant

Includes 1 catch basin, 1 grate, 2 outlets, and 1 plug (2 open sides). Green.
Dimension(s): 12-3/8" L x 12-3/8" W x 12-15/16" H.

DESCRIPTION

The NDS 12 in. x 12 in. Catch Basin 2-Opening Kit features UV-resistant 1-piece injection-molded structural polypropylene construction for strength. 

Applications

Use to collect medium-volume water flow from wet areas in yards, lawns, fairways and sports fields. Can also be used in patios, garages and driveways.

Use in areas where water buildup occurs. Use to catch and divert water to water safe areas away from structures, erosion-prone landscapes and poor drainage areas.

Part of NDS 12" Catch Basin Series.

Length 12-3/8"
Width 12-3/8"
Height 12-15/16"

Use with

3", 4", 6" corrugated singlewall pipe; 3", 4" TripleWall pipe; 3", 4", 6" SDR 35 pipe; singlewall HDPE fittings; DrainTech 9" square riser; DrainTech Universal End Plug and DrainTech pipe adapters.

entry.title: NDS - 1200DSG - 12'' Downspout Defender
entry.summary:
Vendor: NDS
Type: Drain Grates
Price: 52.62

Installing catch basins under downspouts is a best practice for managing stormwater and protecting property. Downspout drainage systems move water away from structures where it can do damage. The Downspout Defender makes a drainage system even more effective by capturing more water and deflecting debris to keep the system running clean.

Fits NDS 12" x 12" Catch Basins.

Product Details

Self-cleaning grate deflects debris before it enters the system
    • Sheds leaves, needles, twigs, nuts, and seeds
    • Prevents system clogs downstream

Protect property & structures with a downspout drainage system
    • Eliminates standing water
    • Moves water away from the foundation where it can do the most damage

Patent-Pending design captures more water than standard grates
    • Eliminates splashing back onto building walls
    • Captures water that overshoots traditional flat grates

Innovative new grate solution sets a higher standard for downspout drainage.
    • More effective and efficient than anything else on the market

Compatibility
  • Fits NDS 12 x 12" Catch Basin Series
  • Height: 9 (installed 7 3/4)

Downloads

  • Downspout Defender Catalog

entry.title: Dura - 090-K - 9'' Double Outlet Catch Basin w/ Green Grate
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dura
Type: Catch Basins
Price: 48.58

Dura 090-K 9" Double Outlet Drainage Kit with Green Grate. Dura Plastic Products provides users with high-quality plastic drainage products engineered with a durable Polypropylene construction. Dura takes pride in implementing changes to better their products, and deliver users with the best possible product in the market. Dura follows their Quality by Design motto, and it has allowed the family owned business to be recognized as an industry leader. This Dura 090-K 9" Double Outlet Drainage Kit with Green Grate is formed out of High Density Polyethylene, a heavy duty plastic material. This 9" Square Catch Basin attaches directly to PVC waste lines, and can be replaced with little effort. The 9" Square Grate is Green, and mounts easily on the Catch Basin. This Double Outlet Basin increases flow through the pipes, and catches large debris, sand, and other heavier grains as they pass through the basin. This 9" Double Outlet Catch Basin comes in Black.

Product Features

  • Part #: DF-090-K
  • Meets Load Rating Class A: Loads of 0-60 PSI Recommended for Light Pedestrian, Bicycle & Wheel Chair Traffic
  • For use with 3" & 4": Sewer & Drain Pipe, Corrugated Pipe, Triple Wall Pipe & 4" Sch 40 Pipe
  • 9" Double Outlet Drainage Kit with Green Grate
  • Box Qty: 1
  • Made in the United States by Dura Plastic Products
  • MPN: 090-K
  • UV Inhibitors to reduce sun damage
  • Grate Made with Polypropylene & Catch Basin Made with ABS
  • Made in United States by Dura Plastic Products
